items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript snippet that enables bulk-uploading and auto-favoriting GIF images directly within the Discord browser client. Conveniently skips files exceeding Discord's 10MB limit, uploads in batches of 10, and auto-favorites each GIF uploaded.
items.title: CheatoOfficial/DiscordBatchGIFUploader: A lightweight JavaScript snippet that enables bulk-uploading and auto-favoriting GIF images directly within the Discord browser client. Conveniently skips files exceeding Discord's 10MB limit, uploads in batches of 10, and auto-favorites each GIF uploaded.

items.content_html: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
items.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
